# accessibilityAssistiveTechnologyFocusedIdentifiers()

**Instance Method**

Returns a set of identifier keys indicating which assistive app has focus on the accessibility element.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func accessibilityAssistiveTechnologyFocusedIdentifiers() -> Set<UIAccessibility.AssistiveTechnologyIdentifier>?
```

## Getting focus information

- **accessibilityElementDidBecomeFocused()**: Sent after an assistive technology has set its virtual focus on the accessibility element.
- **accessibilityElementDidLoseFocus()**: Sent after an assistive technology has removed its virtual focus from an accessibility element.
- **accessibilityElementIsFocused()**: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether an assistive technology is focused on the accessibility element.
